page.title: 03FAMILIES
page.content: There are 24 children at the school but 7 of the children have brothers or sisters who are also at school. There are therefore 17 families. One family has one child, two families have three children, one family has five children and thirteen families have two children. Most of the other children are either already at school or have left school. Nine families live close enough to walk to school, four live within 3 km of school and four live more than 3 km from school. Eight families travel to school by car. Two families have only one parent. One child is adopted and one is fostered.
